page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: We sent out 40 questionnaires to the houses in the village.As we wanted people to fill them in we did not put any names on them so we did not know who returned them. This was a mistake because we only had 20 returned.We hoped to find out if there was much unemployment in the area so we asked for the numbers of adults over 16,how many worked,were retired,unemployed. These were the results: Adults: * 45 * In Work: * 29 * Retired: * 07 * Unemployed * 03 * At School * 01 * One return stated that there was 1 housewife so we think that the 'missing' 5 adults may well be other housewives.
